page.title: 17School Dinners
page.content: Our school dinners are based on a five star system.The food is split up inti three main categories:(protein, carbohydrates and fat).To be fit and healthy it is best to eat a variety of food from each group. Each food has its own star rating. The ratings are one or two stars. The main course is not star rated, it includes beef casserole, cheese and tomato flan,pies,sausagesand fish fingers. With the main course are a selection of vegetables valued at either one or two stars.Chips are rated at two stars as are roast potatoes but others such as mashed potatoes,peas,carrots,sprouts and salad are valued at only one star. Puddings include fruit pies, flans and crumbles at two stars, biscuits, fresh fruit and drinks are one star.
